com.mappedin.sdk

Class Coordinate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mappedin.sdk.Navigatable
      • com.mappedin.sdk.Coordinate

  • public class Coordinate
extends Navigatable
    A Coordinate represents a 3-dimensional position on the Earth's surface.
    See Also:
    Navigatable

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Coordinate(android.location.Location geoLocation, Map map)
      Covert Geo-reference Location to map coordinate

      • metersFrom

        public double metersFrom(Coordinate coordinate)
        Returns the 2D euclidean distance in meters from this Coordinate to another Coordinate.
        Parameters:
        coordinate - The other coordinate in the distance calculation
        Returns:
        2D euclidean distance in meters

      • metersFrom

        public double metersFrom(Polygon polygon)
        Returns the 2D euclidean distance in meters from this Coordinate to the closest point on the edge of a Polygon. If negative the Coordinate is inside the Polygon, if positive the Coordinate is outside.
        Parameters:
        polygon - The polygon to be used in the distance calculation
        Returns:
        distance in meters

      • metersFrom

        public float metersFrom(Coordinate[] path)
        Returns the 2D euclidean distance in meters from this Coordinate to the closest point on a path represented by an array of Coordinate line segments.
        Parameters:
        path - An array of Coordinates that make up the line segments of the path
        Returns:
        distance in meters

      • isInside

        public boolean isInside(Polygon polygon)
        Check if Coordinate is inside the polygon in 2D space.
        Parameters:
        polygon - The polygon to be used in the bounds calculation
        Returns:
        true if the Coordinate is inside the polygon in 2D space. false if outside.
